meanings.sent1: The acupuncturists at the clinic helped relieve my back pain.
meanings.sent2: Many acupuncturists believe in the healing power of acupuncture.
meanings.sent3: The acupuncturists joked that they could 'pinpoint' the problem with just a few needles.
meanings.sent4: The acupuncturists were like skilled artists, using needles as their paintbrushes.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the gentle touch of the acupuncturists during my treatment.

meanings.sent1: The acupuncturists in the room all had different techniques.
meanings.sent2: We consulted multiple acupuncturists before deciding on a treatment plan.
meanings.sent3: The acupuncturists gathered for a conference to discuss new acupuncture methods.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd of acupuncturists, she stood out with her innovative approach.
meanings.sent5: The acupuncturists worked together harmoniously to provide the best care for their patients.
